footer.aboutText: Belgian bug bounty platform for SMEs and security researchers. Report, collaborate and strengthen digital security together.

register.title: Create an account
register.subtitle: Join the citizen bug bounty platform.
register.success: Account created. Please check your email to verify.
register.savedButEmailIssue: Account created, but we couldn‚Äôt send the verification email. You can verify later.
register.emailInUse: This email is already in use.
register.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.

accept.termsPrefix: By creating an account, I accept the

passwordRules.hint: At least 8 chars with 1 lowercase, 1 uppercase, 1 digit and 1 symbol.

errors.acceptLegal: Please accept the Terms of Service and the Privacy Policy.

password.rules: Password does not meet security requirements.

reset.title: Forgot password
reset.requestHint: Enter the email address associated with your account.
reset.requestSent: If this account exists, a code has been sent to your address.
reset.confirmHint: Enter the code you received and choose a new password.
reset.success: Password updated. You can sign in.

verify.title: Verify your email
verify.subtitle: We sent a code to {{email}}.
verify.help: Enter the code you received by email. Use "resend code" to get a new one.
verify.success: Email verified! You can sign in.

errors.resendFail: Unable to resend the code right now.

dashboard.title: üè¢ Company Dashboard
dashboard.approvalRequired: You must be verified to create a program.

dashboardIntro.title: Thank you for trusting our researchers
dashboardIntro.lead: By publishing a program, you enable responsible disclosures and strengthen your services' security.

scope.title: Define the scope
scope.text: Choose authorized targets, rules, and sensitive information to exclude.

program.title: Publish the program
program.text: Describe expectations, severity levels, and potential rewards.

reports.title: Receive & triage
reports.text: Researchers submit reports. You triage them and fix vulnerabilities.

resource.title: Template & best practices
resource.text: A ready-to-use program template to publish quickly and clearly.

dashboardIntro.needVerification: Your company account must be verified to create a program.

welcome.title: Welcome to your company space
welcome.intro: Securing your systems is essential. By creating a bug bounty program, you allow security researchers to detect vulnerabilities before attackers do. It‚Äôs a modern, efficient, and affordable solution for Belgian SMEs.

benefits.trust: Gain the trust of your clients

welcome.notVerified: Your company is not yet verified. You need to complete your profile before you can create a program.

pending.title: Your account is pending verification
pending.desc: We are reviewing your information. You will be notified once a decision is made.

rejected.title: Your verification was rejected
rejected.desc: Please correct your information and upload a valid document for a new verification.

approved.title: Your company is verified
approved.desc: You can now create and manage your bug bounty programs.

companyNumber.label: Company Number
companyNumber.hint: Enter your official company registration number (Belgian format).

document.label: Supporting Document (PDF)
document.constraints: Format: PDF only, maximum size 20 MB.

bountyExample.title: Example of a validated report with bounty
bountyExample.approved: The report was approved in under 72 hours.

items.clearHint: Explain the context, impact, and conclusion.
items.proofHint: Add concrete artefacts that confirm the vulnerability.
items.scopeHint: Test only the targets allowed by the program.

thanks.title: Thank you
thanks.lead: You help make the web safer for everyone. Your contribution matters.
thanks.share: Consider sharing your ranking or badges on LinkedIn to showcase your commitment.
thanks.callToAction: Keep submitting reports and climb the leaderboard.

training.title: Ethical hacking training platforms
training.intro: Here are some popular sites to practice:

platforms.tryhackmeDesc: Interactive labs and guided paths for beginners and intermediates.
platforms.hacktheboxDesc: Hands-on machines and challenges to sharpen your skills.
platforms.portswiggerDesc: Excellent web labs to learn vulnerabilities and exploitation techniques.

training.cta: Feel free to share your progress with the community on our forum!

welcome.title: Welcome, ethical hacker
welcome.lead1: Thanks for joining our citizen cybersecurity platform in Belgium.
welcome.lead2: You're here to learn, practice, and submit reports that make the web safer.

links.guide: How to write a good report

welcome.thanks: Thank you for helping secure Belgian companies!

weekly.title: Weekly challenge
weekly.empty: No active challenge at the moment.

share.title: Share your ranking
share.subtitle: Currently #{{rank}} with {{points}} points.
share.text: {{username}} is ranked #{{rank}} with {{points}} points on the Sentinelle platform.

list.title: Available audit programs
list.empty: No program available at the moment.

hasActive.title: A program is already pending or active for your company.
hasActive.desc: You cannot create a new one for now.

fields.title: Program title
fields.descHint: Provide scope, rules of engagement, exclusions, etc.
fields.goalHint: e.g., Focus on injections and auth bypass.

errors.alreadyActive: A program is already pending/active for your company.

detail.title: Program details
detail.subtitle: View program information and submit a report
detail.publishDesc: Activate your program by completing the secure Stripe payment.

return.title: Payment confirmation
return.success: Payment confirmed, your program is now published!

hero.title: Bug bounty platform for Belgian SMEs
hero.lede: Cybercrime is rising. Move from reactive to proactive security: clear rules, legal framing and an ethical research community continuously testing your systems.
hero.compliance: Responsible disclosure and safe-harbor, by design

advantages.title: Why choose the platform
advantages.subtitle: A responsible model to reduce risk and build trust.

secure.title: Security first
secure.text: Framed programs, defined scope, and methodical vulnerability reviews.

disclosure.title: Responsible disclosure
disclosure.text: A clear process for safe and timely handling of reports.

safeHarbor.title: Safe-harbor
safeHarbor.text: Contractual protection for good-faith researchers within scope.

fairRewards.title: Fair rewards
fairRewards.text: Progressive bounties aligned with severity and impact.

community.title: Ethical community
community.text: Curated profiles, feedback loops and continuous improvement.

belgium.title: Local footprint
belgium.text: Aligned with Belgian and EU legal frameworks.

how.title: How it works
how.subtitle: A continuous cycle to improve security.

step1.title: Scope definition
step1.text: Authorized assets, rules of engagement and operational constraints.

step2.title: Guided research
step2.text: Ethical testing within scope and timelines.

step3.title: Actionable reporting
step3.text: Evidence, reproduction steps, severity and prioritized fixes.

step4.title: Fix & validation
step4.text: Remediation, re-tests, then reward based on impact.

assurance.title: Trust, compliance and support
assurance.subtitle: A platform built to reduce risk and accelerate remediation.

policy.title: Clear policy
policy.text: Usage rules, privacy safeguards and explicit prohibitions.

privacy.title: Data protection
privacy.text: Procedures to avoid personal data and secure exchanges.

response.title: Response SLAs
response.text: Receipt, triage and follow-up until closure.

my.title: My reports
my.empty: You haven‚Äôt submitted any reports yet.

submit.title: Submit a report
submit.hint: Attach a PDF that includes all necessary technical details.

status.alreadySubmitted: A report has already been submitted for this program.

company.title: Company information
company.docHint1: An example is available in the documentation.
company.docHint2: You can resend the document if your verification is pending or rejected.

publisher.title: Publisher
publisher.body: Bug Bounty Platform ‚Äì Belgian non-profit/company dedicated to SMEs and security researchers.

host.title: Hosting
host.body: Hosted by a provider located in the EU. Availability and backups follow best practices.

contact.title: Contact
contact.body: For any request related to the site, moderation or legal notices, write to

data.title: Personal data
data.body: Data is processed in compliance with GDPR. You have rights of access, rectification, erasure and objection.

ip.title: Intellectual property
ip.body: Published content (texts, logos, graphics) is protected. Any unauthorised reproduction is prohibited.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Questions, feedback or support request? Drop us a line.

fields.name: Name
fields.subject: Subject
fields.consent: I agree to the use of my data to process this request.

contact.success: Message sent. Thanks for reaching out!

forum.title: Discussion space
forum.subtitle: Researchers, companies and admins chat here.

admin.tooLong: Your message is too long (max 300 characters).

forum.banned: You have been banned and cannot post.
forum.error: An error occurred. Please try again.

intro.title: Welcome to the Administrator Area
intro.p1: We are pleased to have you among the administrators of the Sentinelle platform. Your role is key to ensuring the security, reliability, and transparency of our cybersecurity ecosystem.
intro.p2: From here, you can oversee programs, moderate discussions, verify companies, and ensure smooth community operations.
intro.p3: Thank you for your commitment to protecting users and making Sentinelle a benchmark for bug bounty programs in Belgium.

create.title: Create a reward
create.dateInfo: Date: the payment date is stored when the reward is saved.
create.proofInfo: You can attach a proof later (PDF/PNG/JPEG).

form.subtitle: Winning code challenge, linked to a program

validation.required: Title, period and program are required.
validation.codeRequired: Winning code is required on creation.
